name: mcgl.polypha.ga
details: The site consists of four pages: the main page, a page with a search for leaked data, a page with the history of the project in the form of a timeline, and a page with hacks and scripts for the game. The search is carried out at the level of sql queries. Hacks page has authorization to access content.

name: helper-bot
description: Discord bot for answering popular questions. Includes web-ui for editing bot answers

name: shiel-bot
description: Discord bot for web-scraping black desert market registration queue
details: Data is obtained by accessing the web marketplace API and scraping the web page (for coupons). Includes a web interface for easy setup

name: tcp-servers-status
details: A small service and web application that pings tcp ports and maintains latency statistics with subsequent visualization in charts.js

name: bdo-sieges
description: Interactive map for the planning stage of sieges in Black Desert Online
details: Allows you to place various objects on the game map to visualize the siege process.
